title: Linear Equations Practice
subject: Mathematics
description: Solve the given set of linear equations and show all working steps. Include graphical representation where applicable.
instructions: Complete all 15 problems. Show working for full marks.

title: Photosynthesis Essay
subject: Biology
description: Write a detailed essay on photosynthesis process, its importance, and factors affecting it.
instructions: Minimum 500 words. Include diagrams and examples.

title: World War II Timeline
subject: History
description: Create a comprehensive timeline of major World War II events with analysis of their impact.
instructions: Include dates, locations, and significance of each event.

title: Chemical Reactions Lab Report
subject: Chemistry
description: Complete lab report on acid-base reactions with observations and conclusions.
instructions: Follow standard lab report format. Include hypothesis and analysis.

title: Shakespeare Sonnet Analysis
subject: English
description: Analyze Sonnet 18 by Shakespeare focusing on literary devices and themes.
instructions: Identify and explain at least 5 literary devices used.
